meanings.sent1: The walls in the room were paintable, so we decided to add a pop of color.
meanings.sent2: The old wooden chair was paintable, so I gave it a fresh coat of white paint.
meanings.sent3: The paintable canvas seemed to beg for vibrant colors to be splashed across it.
meanings.sent4: Her face lit up like a paintable masterpiece when she saw the finished mural.
meanings.sent5: The artist's palette held a rainbow of paintable possibilities.

meanings.sent1: The smooth surface of the table was perfect for the paintable design we had in mind.
meanings.sent2: The art store had a variety of paintable canvases for sale.
meanings.sent3: The paintable walls of the art studio were a blank canvas waiting to be transformed.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a paintable landscape, with flowers blooming in every color imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The paintable pottery was ready to be turned into unique works of art.
